testcase.name: Login to Amazon website with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Amazon login page..........................................passed When User login with valid name "ValidUser" and valid password "ValidPassword".passed Then User is logged into the application "true".............................passed And The Login page redirects to users dashboard and Valid user name "ValidUser" is displayed.passed

testcase.name: Login to Amazon website with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Amazon login page..........................................passed When User login with invalid name "InvalidUser" and invalid password "InvalidPassword".passed Then User is logged into the application "false"............................passed And Error message is displayed..............................................passed
